tit.e: Tatami-iwashi (dried baby sardines flattend like paper)
Tatami-iwashi (dried baby sardines flattend like paper)
Tatami-iwashi (dried baby sardines flattened like paper)
tit.cmt: タイトルのため、カッコ内の補足削除 (次文に説明あり)→新規ルールにより括弧内補足追加

sen.j: たたみいわし（畳鰯）は、カタクチイワシの稚魚を洗い、生のままあるいは一度ゆでてから、葭簀（よしず）や木枠に貼った目の細かい網で漉いて天日干しし、薄い板状（網状）に加工した食品。
sen.e: Tatami-iwashi is a processed food of baby sardines whose production process consists of cleansing them, sifting them, either as they are or after boiling, by the use of a reed screen or a net of fine mesh put on a wooden frame, drying them in the sun and forming them into a thin sheet (net-like).

Tatami-iwashi is a processed food of baby sardines whose production process consists of cleaning and sifting, either before or after boiling, with a reed screen or fine mesh on a wooden frame, then drying them in the sun and forming them into a thin sheet (net-like).

Tatami-iwashi is a processed food of baby sardines whose production process consists of cleaning and sifting, either before or after boiling, with a reed screen or fine mesh on a wooden frame, then drying them in the sun and forming them into a thin sheet (net-like).

sen.j: 軽くあぶり、そのまままたは醤油をつけて食べる。
sen.e: It is normally eaten as it is or with soy sauce.
It is normally eaten as it is or with soy sauce.
It is normally eaten as it is or with soy sauce.

sen.j: パリパリした食感が特徴。
sen.e: It has a unique, crunchy texture.
It has a unique, crunchy texture.
